claim.quote_text: Beginning with Innovative Medicine, where our results demonstrate the depth of our expertise across oncology, immunology, and neuroscience. Worldwide sales of $15 billion increased 5.3% despite an approximate 1070 basis point headwind from STELARA, illustrating the continued strength of our key brands and new launches.

verification.explanation: This is a Innovative Medicine revenue claim. Our data only includes total company-level figures.

claim.quote_text: In oncology, starting with multiple myeloma, DARZALEX growth was 19.9%, primarily driven by continued strong share gains of approximately 5.7 points across all lines of therapy, with nearly nine points in the frontline setting as well as market growth.

verification.explanation: This is a DARZALEX revenue growth claim. Our data only includes total company-level figures.

claim.speaker: Darren Snellgrove
